home.freeForeverDescription: All tools are and will always be free to use. No premium features.
home.noTrackingDescription: We don't track or store any of your data. Everything runs in your browser.
home.openSourceDescription: All tools are open source and available on GitHub. Contributions welcome!

supportOverlay.description2: Every contribution helps maintain and improve these tools!
supportOverlay.title: Enjoying Our Developer Tools?
supportOverlay.yourStarHelps: Your star helps others discover these tools too!

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.introduction: Welcome to RocksDev Tools. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

no-data-collection.title: Data Collection
no-data-collection.description: Apart from basic analytics data, we do not collect any personal information. All tools run locally in your browser.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.description: We use necessary cookies to remember your language preferences and Google Analytics cookies to help us improve our services.

third-party.title: Third-Party Services
third-party.description: Our website is hosted on Vercel and uses Google Analytics for visitor analytics. These services may collect basic access data such as IP addresses and browser types.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.description: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. Significant changes will be notified through the website.

contact-us.title: Contact Us
contact-us.introduction: Thank you for using RocksDev Tools. If you have any questions, suggestions, or opportunities for collaboration, please reach out to us through the following channels:

social.title: Social Media
social.description: You can find us on the following platforms:

github.title: GitHub
github.description: If you find any issues or want to contribute code, please visit our GitHub repository.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We value your feedback! If you have any suggestions or find any issues, please let us know.
